long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
styleme is a short and simple Chrome extension allowing users to customize the styles behind any of their favorite websites! styleme users can create styles as they please, and share them with others, too!

style the web with styleme!
